name: Tropical Salsa with Grilled Mango
author: UNCLEBEN1980
summary: I'm proud of this creation! Delicious, exciting salsa that is a perfect compliment to grilled chicken, grilled or broiled fish, and grilled pork.
ingredients: 1  ripe mango, peeled and sliced 1/4 inch thick
¼ cup finely chopped red onion
2 tablespoons finely chopped red bell pepper
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat
In a mixing bowl, toss mango slices with oil to coat
Lightly oil grate, place mango slices on grill
Cook for 4 minutes on each side, until nicely browned with grill marks
Remove mango from grill, cut into small cubes, and transfer to a mixing bowl
Stir in onion, red pepper, jalapeno pepper, lime juice, salt, sugar, and ginger
Serve at room temperature, chill until ready to serve, or serve hot by heating through in a nonstick skillet
